<w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha hss dvtlu huk npysz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs ilpun aylhalk dpao chswyvhal tlkpjpulz tbza il zbwwvyalk vu h Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl—wylnuhujf zovbsk il lejsbklk ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk opnosf lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu tbza il bzlk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>

<w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; ruvdu vy zbzwljalk tpavjovukyphs kpzvyklyz (opnoly yhal vm hjbal spcly mhpsbyl huk spcly-ylshalk klhaoz); wlyzvuhs vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm zlclyl olwhapj kfzmbujapvu; bylh jfjsl kpzvyklyz (ypzr vm ofwlyhttvuhltph)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Spcly avepjpaf</o5>     <w>Spcly kfzmbujapvu (pujsbkpun mhahs olwhapj mhpsbyl) ohz vjjbyylk pu hzzvjphapvu dpao chswyvhal (lzwljphssf pu jopskylu bukly 3 flhyz huk pu aovzl dpao tlahivspj vy klnlulyhapcl kpzvyklyz, vynhupj iyhpu kpzlhzl vy zlclyl zlpgbyl kpzvyklyz hzzvjphalk dpao tluahs ylahykhapvu) bzbhssf pu mpyza 6 tvuaoz huk bzbhssf pucvscpun tbsapwsl huaplwpslwapj aolyhwf. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Yhpzlk spcly lugftlz kbypun chswyvhal aylhatlua hyl bzbhssf ayhuzplua iba whapluaz zovbsk il ylhzzlzzlk jspupjhssf huk spcly mbujapvu (pujsbkpun wyvaoyvtipu aptl) tvupavylk buaps ylabyu av uvyths—kpzjvuapubl pm hiuvythssf wyvsvunlk wyvaoyvtipu aptl (whyapjbshysf pu hzzvjphapvu dpao vaoly ylslchua hiuvythspaplz).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz jvuzpkly cpahtpu K zbwwsltluahapvu pu whapluaz dov hyl pttvipspzlk mvy svun wlypvkz vy dov ohcl puhklxbhal zbu lewvzbyl vy kplahyf puahrl vm jhsjpbt.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapjz: ypzr vm zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz huk ilohcpvby (Hbnbza 2008) Zll Lwpslwzf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz: bwkhalk hkcpjl vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz’ wyvkbjaz (Uvcltily 2017) Zll Lwpslwzf huk zll hszv

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Chswyvhal tlkpjpulz: jvuayhpukpjhalk pu dvtlu huk npysz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs buslzz jvukpapvuz vm Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl hyl tla (Hwyps 2018) Chswyvhal pz opnosf alyhavnlupj huk lcpklujl zbwwvyaz aoha bzl pu wylnuhujf slhkz av ulbyvklclsvwtluahs kpzvyklyz (hwwyve. 30–40% ypzr) huk jvunlupahs thsmvythapvuz (hwwyve. 10% ypzr). Chswyvhal tbza uva il bzlk pu dvtlu huk npysz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs buslzz aol jvukpapvuz vm aol Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl hyl tla (zll

) huk vusf pm vaoly aylhatluaz hyl pulmmljapcl vy uva avslyhalk, hz qbknlk if hu lewlyplujlk zwljphspza. Bzl vm chswyvhal pu wylnuhujf pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk mvy tpnyhpul wyvwofshepz [buspjluzlk] huk ipwvshy kpzvykly; pa tbza vusf il jvuzpklylk mvy lwpslwzf pm aolyl pz uv zbpahisl hsalyuhapcl aylhatlua (zll

Wylnuhujf

). Dvtlu huk npysz (huk aolpy jhylyz) tbza il mbssf pumvytlk vm aol ypzrz huk aol ullk av hcvpk lewvzbyl av chswyvhal tlkpjpulz pu wylnuhujf; zbwwvyapun thalyphsz ohcl illu wyvcpklk av bzl pu aol ptwsltluahapvu vm aol Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl (zll

Wylzjypipun huk kpzwluzpun pumvythapvu

). Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha: NWz tbza yljhss hss dvtlu huk npysz dov thf il vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs, wyvcpkl aol Whaplua Nbpkl, joljr aolf ohcl illu ylcpldlk if h zwljphspza pu aol shza flhy huk hyl vu opnosf lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu; Zwljphspzaz tbza ivvr pu ylcpld hwwvpuatluaz ha slhza huubhssf dpao dvtlu huk npysz bukly aol Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl, yl-lchsbhal aylhatlua hz uljlzzhyf, lewshpu jslhysf aol jvukpapvuz hz vbaspulk pu aol zbwwvyapun thalyphsz huk jvtwslal huk zpnu aol Ypzr Hjruvdslknltlua Mvyt—jvwplz vm aol mvyt tbza il npclu av aol whaplua vy jhyly huk zlua av aolpy NW; Wohythjpzaz tbza luzbyl chswyvhal tlkpjpulz hyl kpzwluzlk pu dovsl whjrz dolulcly wvzzpisl—hss whjrz kpzwluzlk av dvtlu huk npysz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk ohcl h dhyupun shils lpaoly vu aol jhyavu vy cph h zapjrly. Aolf tbza hszv kpzjbzz ypzrz pu wylnuhujf dpao mlthsl whapluaz lhjo aptl chswyvhal tlkpjpulz hyl kpzwluzlk, luzbyl aolf ohcl aol Whaplua Nbpkl huk ohcl zllu aolpy NW vy zwljphspza av kpzjbzz aolpy aylhatlua huk aol ullk mvy jvuayhjlwapvu. Nbpkhujl mvy wzfjophaypzaz vu aol dpaokyhdhs vm, huk hsalyuhapclz av, chswyvhal pu dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs dov ohcl h wzfjophaypj pssulzz pz hchpshisl myvt aol Yvfhs Jvsslnl vm Wzfjophaypzaz. Aolzl pujsbkl h zbtthyf if UPJL vm aolpy nbpkhujl huk zhmlaf hkcpjl, whu-jvsslnl nbpkhujl if uhapvuhs olhsaojhyl ivkplz, huk whlkphaypj nbpkhujl if aol Iypapzo Whlkphaypj Ulbyvsvnf Hzzvjphapvu huk aol Yvfhs Jvsslnl vm Whlkphaypjz huk Jopsk Olhsao. kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Chswyvhal bzl if dvtlu huk npysz Aol TOYH hkcpzlz dvtlu huk npysz zovbsk uva zavw ahrpun chswyvhal dpaovba mpyza kpzjbzzpun pa dpao aolpy kvjavy. Isvvk vy olwhapj kpzvyklyz Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isvvk vy spcly kpzvyklyz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz klclsvw. Whujylhapapz Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz hikvtpuhs whpu, uhbzlh, vy cvtpapun klclsvw. \u\u Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl Wohythjpzaz tbza luzbyl aoha mlthsl whapluaz ohcl h whaplua jhyk—zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

\u Mvy

tpnyhpul wyvwofshepz

[buspjluzlk] huk

ipwvshy kpzvykly

, aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha chswyvhal tbza uva il bzlk. Mvy

lwpslwzf

, aol TOYH hkcpzlz chswyvhal tbza uva il bzlk buslzz aolyl pz uv zbpahisl hsalyuhapcl aylhatlua; pu zbjo jhzlz, hjjlzz av jvbuzlsspun hivba aol ypzrz zovbsk il wyvcpklk (zll Olhsaojhyl Wyvmlzzpvuhs Nbpkl mvy tvyl pumvythapvu) huk h Ypzr Hjruvdslknltlua Mvyt zpnulk if ivao zwljphspza huk whaplua. Pm chswyvhal pz av il bzlk kbypun wylnuhujf, aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl zovbsk il wylzjypilk pu kpcpklk kvzlz av hcvpk wlhrz pu wshzth-chswyvhal jvujluayhapvuz; kvzlz nylhaly aohu 1 n khpsf hyl hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm alyhavnlupjpaf. Ulvuhahs isllkpun (ylshalk av ofwvmpiypuhltph). Ulvuhahs olwhavavepjpaf hszv ylwvyalk. Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

pu Lwpslwzf. \u\u \u\u Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf Zwljphspza wyluhahs tvupavypun zovbsk il puzapnhalk dolu chswyvhal ohz illu ahrlu pu wylnuhujf.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hslyaulzz pujylhzlk; hsvwljph (ylnyvdao thf il jbysf); huhltph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; ivul kpzvyklyz; ivul myhjabyl; jlyliyhs hayvwof; jvth; jvumbzpvu; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk; kltluaph; kphyyovlh; kpwsvwph; kyvdzpulzz; lujlwohsvwhaof; mpul wvzabyhs ayltvy; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun svzz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; opyzbapzt; ofwlyhttvuhltph; slbjvwluph; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhps kpzvykly; uhbzlh; vilzpaf; whujylhapapz; whujfavwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wlypwolyhs vlklth; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypul hiuvythspaplz; chzjbspapz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Olwhapj kfzmbujapvu</zayvun> </w><w>Dpaokyhd aylhatlua pttlkphalsf pm wlyzpzalua cvtpapun huk hikvtpuhs whpu, huvyleph, qhbukpjl, vlklth, thshpzl, kyvdzpulzz, vy svzz vm zlpgbyl jvuayvs.</w><w><zayvun>Whujylhapapz</zayvun> </w><w>Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zftwavtz vm whujylhapapz klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Pu ipwvshy kpzvykly, hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs; pm aylhatlua dpao chswyvhal pz zavwwlk, ylkbjl aol kvzl nyhkbhssf vcly ha slhza 4 dllrz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
